metadata.description: Comprehensive organization of parameters data separated by profession based on type mappings from types.json organization

profession_files.description: Parameters for sales processes, client management, and communication workflows
Parameters for lead generation, prospect qualification, and customer segmentation
Parameters for backend systems, APIs, databases, and technical infrastructure
Parameters for SEO optimization, analytics, and digital marketing performance
Parameters for visual design, branding elements, and graphic design workflows
Parameters for recruitment processes, candidate tracking, and HR workflows
Parameters for project planning, tracking, and management workflows

additional_files.description: Common parameters without specific profession assignment
additional_files.purpose: Parameters that apply across multiple professions or have general applicability
Overview and index of all organized parameter files
Instructions for using the organized parameter structure

managers.focus: Business operations, client relations, team management, and recruitment

developers.focus: Technical infrastructure, APIs, databases, and system architecture

designers.focus: Visual design, branding, and user interface elements

marketers.focus: Digital marketing, SEO optimization, and analytics

organized_by_profession/.description: Directory containing all profession-specific and general parameter JSON files

source_data_format.atomization: Each parameter is listed as a separate entry linked to its type

profession_mapping.coverage: Mapped types to professions based on previous categorization

data_quality_metrics.consistency: All files follow standardized JSON structure with metadata, summary, and entries
data_quality_metrics.organization_coverage: Key professions from types organization represented
data_quality_metrics.parameter_categorization: Parameters grouped by logical categories within each profession
data_quality_metrics.cross_reference_ready: Files can be cross-referenced with types organization

benefits_achieved: Profession-specific parameter access for targeted analysis
Reduced data complexity - focused parameter sets per profession
Ready for profession-specific model training and analysis
Clear parameter categorization for better understanding

usage_recommendations.for_ai_training: Use profession-specific parameter files for targeted model training
usage_recommendations.for_analysis: Cross-reference parameter files with corresponding types files
usage_recommendations.for_development: Leverage parameter categories for feature development
usage_recommendations.for_documentation: Use as reference for profession-specific parameter requirements

relationship_to_types_organization.complementary_structure: Parameters organization complements the types organization
relationship_to_types_organization.cross_reference_enabled: Types and parameters can be easily cross-referenced by profession
relationship_to_types_organization.consistent_profession_mapping: Uses same profession categories as types organization
relationship_to_types_organization.enhanced_analysis_capability: Combined use enables comprehensive profession analysis
